channels.name: Continuous HUE changing time, ms per 1

en.WB-MRGBW-D_template_title: WB-MRGBW-D fw3 (4-channel CV LED dimmer fw 3.0)
en.fader_inc_title: Time to increase the value from 0 to 100%, ms
en.fader_dec_title: Time to decrease the value from 0 to 100%, ms
en.inc_h_act_title: Increase HUE of RGB strip (circular, HSV-H)
en.dec_h_act_title: Decrease HUE of RGB strip (circular, HSV-H)
en.inc_dec_h_act_title: Increase/decrease HUE of RGB strip (circular, HSV-H)
en.lp_hold_time_title: Hold time for long press detection, ms
en.lp_repeat_time_title: The rate of change of the parameter when holding the button, ms/unit
en.pwm_frequency_factor_description: PWM frequency is calculated by formula: 24 kHz / factor
en.channel_min_value_description: Raw PWM value corresponding to minimum brightness (1%)
en.channel_max_value_description: Raw PWM value corresponding to maximum brightness (100%)
en.hue_fader_description: Time for changing HUE by 360. Please note that the HUE is changing by the shortest path (f.e. 10 -> 0 -> 350).
